subject: Basketball
Steroids
Tests (Drug Use)
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Orlando forward Hedo Turkoglu was suspended 20 games by the N.B.A. after testing positive for methenolone, an anabolic steroid. He apologized to the Magic organization, fans and teammates.
snippet: Orlando forward Hedo Turkoglu was suspended 20 games by the N.B.A. after testing positive for methenolone, an anabolic steroid. He apologized to the Magic organization, fans and teammates.
